entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
